function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential increase in exclusion, inequality, discrimination, and global unemployment due to COVID-19","Impact":"Long-term impact on poverty and social inequality","Mitigation":"Implementing comprehensive social protection systems and policy instruments","Technologies":"Universal social protection systems, policy instruments","People":"Vulnerable populations, workers","Owner":"Government, international organizations"},{"Description":"Disruptions in global supply chains and sectoral activities due to COVID-19","Impact":"Decreased output for local firms, unavailability of raw materials","Mitigation":"Improving understanding, flexibility, and diversification in supply chain strategies","Technologies":"Supply chain analytics, diversification tools","People":"Exporting and importing countries","Owner":"Companies, governments, international trade organizations"},{"Description":"Creation of momentary \\"
